description:
Provides a ECS disk resource.

-> **NOTE:** One of `size` or `snapshot_id` is required when specifying an ECS disk. If all of them be specified, `size` must more than the size of snapshot which `snapshot_id` represents. Currently, `alicloud_disk` doesn't resize disk.

tfcfnid.description: Internal identifier for tracking resource changes. Do not use.

AvailabilityZone.description: The Zone to create the disk in.

Category.description: Category of the disk. Valid values are `cloud`, `cloud_efficiency`, `cloud_ssd`, `cloud_essd`. Default is `cloud_efficiency`.

DeleteAutoSnapshot.description: Indicates whether the automatic snapshot is deleted when the disk is released. Default value: false.

DeleteWithInstance.description: Indicates whether the disk is released together with the instance: Default value: false.

Description.description: Description of the disk. This description can have a string of 2 to 256 characters, It cannot begin with http:// or https://. Default value is null.

EnableAutoSnapshot.description: Indicates whether to apply a created automatic snapshot policy to the disk. Default value: false.

Encrypted.description: If true, the disk will be encrypted, conflict with `snapshot_id`.

Name.description: Name of the ECS disk. This name can have a string of 2 to 128 characters, must contain only alphanumeric characters or hyphens, such as "-",".","_", and must not begin or end with a hyphen, and must not begin with http:// or https://. Default value is null.

ResourceGroupId.description:
The Id of resource group which the disk belongs.
-> **NOTE:** Disk category `cloud` has been outdated and it only can be used none I/O Optimized ECS instances. Recommend `cloud_efficiency` and `cloud_ssd` disk.

Size.description: The size of the disk in GiBs. When resize the disk, the new size must be greater than the former value, or you would get an error `InvalidDiskSize.TooSmall`.

SnapshotId.description: A snapshot to base the disk off of. If the disk size required by snapshot is greater than `size`, the `size` will be ignored, conflict with `encrypted`.

Tags.description: A mapping of tags to assign to the resource.
